snippet: Ed Schmidt, a playwright and performer known for staging productions inside his home, is using the former site of La Salle Academy in the East Village for his latest one-man show.
abstract: Grace Notes column; Ed Schmidt, high school basketball coach, performer and playwright known for staging productions inside his home, is using locker room at the Nord Anglia International School in Manhattan as stage for his latest one-man show, Our Last Game.
lead_paragraph: Ed Schmidt, a playwright and performer known for staging productions inside his home, is using the former site of La Salle Academy in the East Village for his latest one-man show.
